verbose_text: To address this question, we correlated mTORC1 activity, defined by S6, S6K1, and eukaryotic translation initiation factor 4E binding protein 1 (4E-BP1) phosphorylation, with FADS2 mRNA expression based on The Cancer Genome Atlas (TCGA) data from 7,407 human cancers representing 32 major tumor types.
evidence: S6, S6K1, and eukaryotic translation initiation factor 4E-binding protein 1 (4E-BP1) phosphorylation
